entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Pellets, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 12:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Snow Pellets
Temperature: -0.3°C

Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
